ticket.title: [PATCH] select helpers with boolean attributes
ticket.original-body:
While upgrading to rails 3.0.3, I ran into the following problem:
@@@ ruby # blog.rb class Blog < ActiveRecord::Base # allow_comments :boolean(1) default(FALSE) # ... end
# view inside a form_for(@blog) <%= f.select :allow_comments, [["On", true], ["Off", false]] %> @@@
If allow_comments was true, "On" would be selected. If allow_comments was false, "Off" would NOT be selected. I've fixed this in the attached patch.
